short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple to-do list chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Minimalist but sufficient To-do list app to help you finish all your tasks

- Chrome extension format keeps your to-dos reachable and convenient
- 'Priority' field which helps you keep track of what tasks are the most important
- High-contrast and readable GUI!
- Bright and engaging colors
- Small Dad jokes to make you laugh and help you destress
- In progress: an email feature through which a summary of the tasks you have completed within a day will be shown
